entries.meaning: A noxious mixture of particulates and gases that is the result of urban air pollution.

verbs.description: smog (third-person singular simple present smogs, present participle smogging, simple past and past participle smogged)

entries.meaning: (informal) To get a smog check; to check a vehicle or have it checked for emissions.
examples: If the car is more than five years old, you'll have to have it smogged before you can register it.
